question_text: Which statement best describes the role of a routing table?
answer_options: It lists all MAC addresses in the network
It determines the path packets should take based on destination IP
It assigns static IP addresses to hosts
It logs all incoming and outgoing packets
correct_answer: It determines the path packets should take based on destination IP
explanation: The routing table allows a router or layer 3 switch to forward packets to the next hop towards their final destination.
